description: Panic handling and error propagation system for the Kairo language

classes.name: FrameContext
classes.description: Provides context for a panic frame

methods.name: crash
methods.description: Terminates the program with the panic context

methods.name: object
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the object that caused the panic

methods.name: type_name
methods.description: Returns the type name of the object that caused the panic

classes.name: Frame
classes.description: Represents a panic frame with error context and location information

constructors.name: Frame
constructors.signature: Frame<T>(obj: T, filename: const char*, lineno: usize)
constructors.description: Creates a panic frame with object, filename, and line number

constructors.name: Frame
constructors.signature: Frame<T>(obj: T, filename: string, lineno: usize)
constructors.description: Creates a panic frame with object, filename as string, and line number

constructors.name: Frame
constructors.signature: Frame(Frame& obj, const string& filename, usize lineno)
constructors.description: Creates a panic frame from another frame (noreturn)

constructors.name: Frame
constructors.signature: Frame(Frame&& obj, const string& filename, usize lineno)
constructors.description: Creates a panic frame from another frame (move, noreturn)

methods.name: file
methods.description: Returns the filename where the panic occurred

methods.name: line
methods.description: Returns the line number where the panic occurred

methods.name: reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the panic

operators.name: operator panic
operators.description: Panic operator used in kairo code as 'panic ...'
operators.note: panic operator can be defined by implementing 'fn op panic(self) -> Frame'
